thread.title: Lamar Odom in critical condition, on breathing machine
thread.title_full: Lamar Odom in critical condition, on breathing machine

author: Larry Brown
title: Lamar Odom in critical condition, on breathing machine
text:
Lamar Odom in critical condition, on breathing machine October 13, 2015 0 0 
Lamar Odom is hanging on after being taken to a hospital Tuesday to be treated after being found unconscious at a brothel in Nevada. 
Odom is on a breathing machine and remains in critical condition, TMZ reporter Dax Holt says. 
The former NBA player was found at a Nevada brothel unconscious and reportedly had been taking some herbal Viagra supplements. 
Khloe Kardashian filed for a divorce from Odom in late 2013, and the former ballplayer has been a wreck since then. His drug abuse apparently was an issue during their marriage, and it also was a problem during parts of his basketball career . 
Odom reportedly suffered a drug relapse over the summer and was in bad shape after one of his good friends died from an overdose. Filed Under:
